name: Deeper than Beyond
description:
Premise

International Space Agency arranged human manned mission to the center of black hole. Your task is to gather visual and conscious data. While you travel beyond event horizon your vessel will be shielded with AGFC (Anitgravitational Flux Capacator) Good luck commander! You are making history!

Gameplay

Take control of vessel that will end up in singularity! Gameplay is more like FNAF series, player is allowed only look around, and interact with environment. While descending to singularity, you will need to keep systems of your vessel in stable state.

How to play
  • LMB to “zoom in” on interest points, RMB to “zoom out”
  • When interacting with devices use LMB click, drag. All those switches, nobs, buttons will interact in intuitive way with LMB
  • You need to interact with computer to start game! Type “init.deorbiting()” and press ENTER to send command!

Other sutff:

  • In case of switches: Turn all the switches in up position.
  • In case of gyro spinning wild: Using buttons try to stop spin and position bright dot in center.
  • In case of unbalanced batteries: Use 2 switches to balance charge between all 3 batteries.
  • In case of wrong oscillation: Use 2 nobs to tweak (white) wave to desired (orange) state.
  • In case of software malfunction: Type suggested commands to fix malfunctions.
